isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - LIGHT SYSTEMS - OPERATION - Stop Light Switch, Truck With Air Brakes And International Turn Signal Without International Engine

svcproc.title: Stop Light Switch, Truck With Air Brakes And International Turn Signal Without International Engine
svcproc.para: Power is supplied from junction block (J1) to circuit 14R/14A, fuse F9, and circuit 70, connector (46) and a red wire to the stop light switch (70). Power is also fed to stop light switch (71) from stop light switch (70) by way of a red wire.

When service brakes are applied, the contacts of the air actuated stop light switches (70) and (71) close and power flows through the switches and brown wires to connector (46). From connector (46) power flows through circuit 70A/70B to the turn signal switch connector (459).
